name: ems_catalog_loader_db
sql_load:
select CSRCodigo, 
					   CSRName, 
					   CSRUrl,  
					   CSRType, 
					   CSRService, 
					   CSRComment, 
					   CSRVersion, 
					   CSROwner, 
					   CSRResultCache, 
					   CSRAuthorization, 
					   CSRLang, 
					   CSRTimeout, 
					   CSREnable, 
					   CSRContentType 
				from BDAcesso.dbo.TB_CatalogoServicoRest
sql_update:
select CSRCodigo, 
					   CSRName, 
					   CSRUrl,  
					   CSRType, 
					   CSRService, 
					   CSRComment, 
					   CSRVersion, 
					   CSROwner, 
					   CSRResultCache, 
					   CSRAuthorization, 
					   CSRLang, 
					   CSRTimeout, 
					   CSREnable, 
					   CSRContentType 
				from BDAcesso.dbo.TB_CatalogoServicoRest 
				where CSRDataAlteracao >= ?
